column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday August 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR LEESTOWN RD AT CITATION BLVD:
column4: All inbound lanes shutdown until further notice due to a building collapse in the area.  Traffic diverted to either side of Citation Blvd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR LEESTOWN RD AT CITATION BLVD:
column4: Expect heavier congestion on Buck Ln/Mercer Rd/Greendale Rd due to diverted semis.
